Create index¶

Clean.index(col: str)¶

Set an index to the main dataframe

Parameters

col (str) – column name where to index from

Example

ds.index("mycol")

Date index¶

Clean.dateindex(col: str)¶

Set a datetime index from a column

Parameters

col (str) – column name where to index the date from

Example

ds.dateindex("mycol")
